Hello everyone! :relaxed:

I'm experimenting something new that I think will be the future of marketing: ungated campaigns.

We are basically driving traffic from Linkedin Ads to a HS landing page without any form to access it. The conversions on the assets (content/videos) are tracked via CTAs.

This is the idea, but in practice I am unsure what can/should be tracked in an ungated campaign vs a gated one. :melting_face:

:point_right: *Does anyone here have best practices or state of the art documentation on how to run an ungated campaign in HubSpot?*

Thanks!!! :sparkles::pray:
